trans-unit.source: Provides event information for events that occur when a tooltip opens or closes.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce informazioni sull'evento per eventi che si verificano quando una descrizione comando apre o chiude.

trans-unit.source: When a tooltip opens and closes, this class provides event information.
trans-unit.target: Quando una descrizione comandi viene aperto e chiuso, questa classe fornisce informazioni sull'evento.

trans-unit.source: The element that specifies the tooltip inherits from either <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento che specifica la descrizione comando eredita da uno <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>o <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, open and close events exist on both of these classes.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, gli eventi di aperti e chiusura presenti in entrambe le classi.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events that use this class.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente elenca gli eventi che utilizzano questa classe.

trans-unit.source: |Events that occur when a tooltip opens|Events that occur when a tooltip closes| |--------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>| These events are registered by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> class as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent> fields.
trans-unit.target: | Gli eventi che si verificano quando viene visualizzata una descrizione comando | Gli eventi che si verificano quando si chiude una descrizione comando | |--------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>| Questi eventi vengono registrati mediante il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>di classi di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent>campi.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> classes both implement the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> and expose this event by defining the events in the previous table The ToolTipEventArgs class overrides the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>entrambe le classi implementano la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>ed esegue l'override di questo evento definendo gli eventi nella tabella precedente ToolTipEventArgs la classe di esporre il <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: However, this protected member does not appear on the ToolTipEventArgs list of members because the method is sealed and cannot be overridden in classes from ToolTipEventArgs.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, questo membro protetto non vengono visualizzati nell'elenco dei membri ToolTipEventArgs perché il metodo è sealed e non può essere sottoposto a override nelle classi da ToolTipEventArgs.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of the method in this class casts the event handler delegate that is provided as a parameter to the method to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipEventHandler> type.
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione del metodo in questa classe esegue il cast di delegato del gestore eventi che viene fornito come parametro al metodo per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipEventHandler>tipo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: If the tooltip is defined as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> object, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> class are also raised when a tooltip opens and closes.
trans-unit.target: Se la descrizione comando viene definita come un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>oggetto, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed>gli eventi del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>classe vengono generati anche quando una descrizione comandi viene aperto e chiuso.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>
